snippet: The issuance of C.M.B.S. — commercial mortgage-backed securities — peaked in mid 2007, just as the worst loans were being made. With some 2007 loans coming due, the delinquency rates on C.M.B.S. loans have risen to the highest level ever.
lead_paragraph: The issuance of C.M.B.S. — commercial mortgage-backed securities — peaked in mid 2007, just as the worst loans were being made. With some 2007 loans coming due, the delinquency rates on C.M.B.S. loans have risen to the highest level ever.
